target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Conferencing client's Manage Contacts window, select the Admin > Manage Policies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Conferencing client's Manage Contacts window, select the Admin > Manage Policies menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Policy Manager window, click the New Policy button.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Policy Manager dialog that appears, type a name for your new policy and click OK.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Policy Manager window, click on the right column of the policy setting you wish to change.

target.name: Step
target.text: After you adjust all of the policy settings, click OK.

target.name: Procedure
target.text: From the Manage Contacts and Users window, select the Community Address Book.

target.name: Step
target.text: From the Manage Contacts and Users window, select the Community Address Book.

target.name: Step
target.text: Click New in the lower-left corner of the window, and select the New User menu item.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the New User window, click items in the right column of the table to provide values for the new user's contact information.

target.name: Step
target.text: Provide values for at least the required contact-list items.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Change the Policy for a User

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Manage Contacts and Users window, select the user and click Edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Manage Contacts and Users window, select the user and click Edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: Select the currently applied policy from the Policy drop-down list.

target.name: Sect1
target.text: Reset the Password for a User

target.name: Procedure
target.text: In the Manage Contacts and Users window, select the user and click Edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Manage Contacts and Users window, select the user and click Edit.

target.name: Step
target.text: In the Password field, type the new password.
